se.codeslasher.io

Class FileAssembler

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.codeslasher.io.FileAssembler

  • public class FileAssembler
extends java.lang.Object
    Assembles files from a List of sources (Path)

    • Method Detail

      • assembleFile

        public static java.nio.file.Path assembleFile(java.nio.file.Path sourceDirectory,
                                              java.nio.file.Path destination,
                                              boolean deleteSources)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Assembles a file from a directory. It will use all the files in the directory (will be sorted by name)
        Parameters:
        sourceDirectory - The directory to assemble files from
        destination - The destination file
        deleteSources - If the source should be deleted after assemble
        Returns:
        Returns the same Path as the destination argument
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Can be that the sources isn't a directory, destination isn't a file or isn't writable

      • assembleFile

        public static java.nio.file.Path assembleFile(java.util.List<java.nio.file.Path> sources,
                                              java.nio.file.Path destination,
                                              boolean deleteSources)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Assembles a file from a List of files (Path) in the order that the List has them in
        Parameters:
        sources - A list of files (in order) to use for the assembling of a file
        destination - The destination file
        deleteSources - If the source should be deleted after assemble
        Returns:
        Returns the same Path as the destination argument
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Can be that the sources isn't readable, destination isn't a file or isn't writeable
